# Model Evaluation and Analysis
This chapter provides a unified framework for evaluating and analyzing models across multiple AI paradigms: `Machine Learning (ML)`, `Deep Learning (DL)`, `Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL)`, `Large Language Models (LLMs)`, and `Computer Vision (CV)`.
The goal is to assess performance, robustness, efficiency, and interpretability, providing actionable insights for model improvement and real-world deployment.
